    public class ParameterSelectionController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller for the Parameter Selection View, handles events generated by the user

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void acceptClicked()
      When the button is clicked the values of every spinner are obtained and sent to the model for the creation of the genetic algorithm, the maze (obstacle course) and the bouncers and the scene is changed to the simulation view

      void updatePopulationSize()
      Whenever the value of the population size spinner changes the upper threshold for the tournament size one is decreased/incremented for it not to allow a tournament size higher than a population one
